definitions.text: a road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island
examples: the accident blocked all traffic at the rotary

definitions.text: a large, rotating machine with seats for children to ride or amusement
marked by obliqueness or indirection in speech or conduct
examples: the explanation was circuitous and puzzling
hear in a roundabout way that her ex-husband was marrying her best friend
a long and circuitous journey by train and boat
a roundabout route avoided rush-hour traffic
